channel.title: No.ip with the server, i followed "how to start your server"
channel.description:
i have everything set up [after fixing the varables and stuff which took about 1-2weeks]
Im using pk planets source and i have everything setup acording to the tut, but it dint cover what do i friggin do with my noip host that i made.
I run the no-ip applecation that i downloaded which shows the client id and stuff, and i run the client and it doesnt let me log in, what do i do to make it online? i cant find a tut for it eather, so please tell me what do i need to do

item.title: No.ip with the server, i followed "how to start your server"
item.dc:creator: @IVIr_Infiniity IVIr Infiniity
item.description:
@IVIr_Infiniity wrote:

Go into the server folder edit client.java it could also be in gui.java for a client, press ctrl + h.in the first box type no-ip (which is the most common one) it might not always be no-ip it could either be localhost, 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 or another no-ip domain.
and client enter
you will get a no-ip address, e.g “servername.no-ip.biz”
change that to your no-ip that your created in no-ip
after you have done that click save. go to compile.bat in your server then run.bat (it should start)
you can then start up your client,

if you dont get what i mean you could always talk to me on msn and i will be more than welcome to help you out,
Steve_allen2009@hotmail.co.uk

just to let you know after about a 2 month of you reaserching through the server and client you will soon know what to do. thats what i did. just guess then you will soon get the hang of it.

Read full topic
item.source: No.ip with the server, i followed "how to start your server"
